channel.title: Kyle Malloy on
channel.description: Recent content in Kyle Malloy on

item.title: About Me
item.description: A year ago I left my 9-5 as a civil engineer in Boston. My wife and I decided it was time for a hard reset. So we took off in a converted church van to travel the US.

item.title: Resume
item.description: Work Experience # <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> KM Engineering Current CEO, Freelance Civil Engineer Remote Providing roadway and site design services, directly to consultants and agencies, on a task-by-task basis, or by retainer for up to 3 months.

item.title: What I'm Doing Now
item.description: Updated on May 9th, 2023 Civil Engineering # <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> Accepting new clients as a part-time, remote, freelancer. Programming # <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> Working on our MVP at CivSoft.
